channel.title: Studies on Praxis
channel.description: Recent content in Studies on Praxis

item.title: Cyborg series
item.description: An ad-hoc study series where we learn and debate extended cognition, new technologies and relevant theories to understand what's ahead. We meet every other tuesday 6 PM EST. Signal group and notes board. Notes Sessions 8 Mar 18, 2023 7PM EST on jit.si Show and tell: Everything to Know About Artificial Intelligence, or AIArticle The Augmented Commons: How Augmented Reality Aids Agile Self-OrganizationPaper 7 Mar 7, 2023

item.title: Embodiment

item.title: Radical Care
item.description: Corruption of care Sat June 19, 2:30PM EST Neoliberalism – the ideology at the root of all our problems (article) From Managerial Feudalism to the Revolt of the Caring Classes (video, 59:10) Ideologies on Care Sat July 17, 2:30PM EST Cindy Milstein on grief, mourning, and building institutions for care in anarchist movements (podcast) Silvia Federici - On Elder Care Work And The Limits of Marxism (19 pages) The Care Manifesto chapter 2, Caring Kinships Pirate Care (guest speakers) Sat July 31, 2:30PM EST Introduction to Pirate Care Criminalization of Solidarity The Hologram: a peer-to-peer social technology of care Institutional Care Sat August 14, 2:30PM EST Information Maintenance As a Practice of Care Hail The Maintainers (article)

item.title: Panopticon
item.description: Discussing Shoshana Zuboff's The Age of Surveillance Capitalism. We highly suggest you to listen to Shoshana's talk at Data & Society (1:08 total, start at 5min). Panopticon session 1 Initial Talk Thursday 7/18/2018, 7 to 9pm Private space Relevant links (from our signal group): QR is King Mobile technology is increasingly serving as the vehicle for a sophisticated national surveillance system that’s deeply intertwined with all kinds of necessary everyday transactions.

item.title: Hyperreal
item.description: This study circle met in Brooklyn every other Wednesday starting April 18 2018 for a total of five sessions. Dude, You Broke the Future Wednesday 4/18/2018, 7 to 9pm at June Bar Dude, You Broke the Future video, 57 minutes Simulacra and Simulation The Precession of Simulacra, page 3 The Divine Irreference of Images, page 4 Download PDF Society of Spectacle Wednesday 5/2/2018, 7 to 9pm at 375 Menahan Street Chapter 1: The Culmination of Separation Chapter 2: The Commodity as Spectacle Chapter 6: Spetacular Time download PDF The Work of Art in the Age of Mechanical Reproduction Wednesday 5/16/2018, 7 to 9pm at 375 Menahan Street Download PDF Understanding Media Wednesday 6/6/2018, 7 to 9pm at June Bar The Gadget Lover: Narcissus as Narcosis Challenge and Collapse: The Nemesis of Creativity Download PDF Immediatism, Hakim Bey Wednesday 7/19/2018, 7 to 9pm at Tradesman Bar Immediatism chapter (page 12) Download PDF Telekommunist Manifesto The Manifesto of the Telekommunisten Network Download PDF Simulacra and Simulation Hypermarket and Hypercommodity, page 52 The Implosion of Meaning in the Media, page 55 Simulacra and science fiction, page 81 download PDF

item.title: Making Space
item.description: We meet every other thursday, talk async on our signal group and shared notes. Assessment Exercise Thurday, Feb 16, 2023 Emergent Strategy by Adrienne Maree Brown - Assessment Exercise (p. 187) Download PDF Between The Earth and Empire pp 162-171 Download PDF The Empowerment Manual Thurday, Mar 2, 2023 The Empowerment Manual by Starhawk pp 123-137 Download PDF Turn This World Inside Out: The Emergence of Nurturance Culture Thurday, Mar 16, 2023 Chapter 7: Own, Apologize, Repair- Coming Back To Integrity Abolish the Family Thurday, Mar 30, 2023 chapter 3

item.title: nomadism
item.description: This study circle met in Brooklyn every other week starting March 5th 2019 for a total of four sessions. Treatise on Nomadology: The War Machine Tuesday, Mar 5th 2019, 7-9pm A Thousand Plateaus Deleuze and Guattari Download PDF Apparatus of Capture Tuesday, March 19 2019, 7-9pm A Thousand Plateaus Deleuze and Guattari Download PDF -- The Smooth and the Striated Tuesday, March 26 2019, 7-9pm A Thousand Plateaus Deleuze and Guattari Download PDF Thin Simplifications and Practical Knowledge: Metis Tuesday, April 9 2019, 7-9pm Seeing Like a State James C.

item.title: Queer Families
item.description: The Dialect of Sex: The Case for a Feminist Revolution by Shulamith Firestone Thursday August 10th 2017, 7-9pm Bluestockings Bookstore Chapter 1 download PDF The Straight Mind and Other Essays by Monique Wittig Thursday August 24th 2017, 7-9pm June Bar One Is Not Born a Woman Download PDF The Straight Mind On the Social Contract Download PDF Feminism is Queer: The Intimate Connection Between Queer and Feminist Theory by Mimi Marinucci Wednesday September 13th 2017, 7-9pm June Bar chapter TBD download PDF The History of Sexuality by Michel Foucault Wednesday September 27th 2017, 7-9pm June Bar chapter TBD Download PDF The Dialect of Sex: The Case for a Feminist Revolution by Shulamith Firestone Thursday October 25th 2017, 7-9pm June Bar Last chapter download PDF
